page.title: 19Churches in E/Cdr.and K/n.
page.content: There are 3 churches in our area: St.Theresa's Catholic Church,East Calder and Kirknewton Parish Church. The average number of people who go to St.Theresa's is 150,East Calder 280, Kirknewton 30_40. East Calder Church was built in 1896 and Kirknewton Church was built in 1735.The churches joined together in 1943.The first minister of Kirknewton Church was John Wilkie.The first minister of both churches was Charles O.Allan and the present minister is Allan Brown.Both churches have communion 4 times a year.The minister comes to both schools to take a service. St Theresa's was built in 1934. The priest is Father Hendry.As well as the usual services there are evening services on special occasions.Father Hendry goes to St.Paul's for a service
